metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0810 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: media/libmedia/SoundPool.cpp in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49G, and 6.x before 2016-02-01 mishandles locking requirements, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 25781119.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
